ai-tha-ap280:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap280:1.2_0: It was so good to crash.
ai-tha-ap280:2.2_0: When I’ve seen my mind free of desire,
ai-tha-ap280:2.3_0: I was a lotus pond covered with gold,
ai-tha-ap280:3.2_0: I used to be a fruit.
ai-tha-ap280:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap280:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāluṅkyaputta.
ai-tha-ap280:6.1_0: for the eighth Elder Bāluṅkyaputta (of Buddha),
